note: Chase Rath is the exceptional author behind the defining and thrilling story of Marcus Wraith in HOME FRONT: Where Bravery Saves Lives, the heart-pounding and tear-jerking chapters of BELOVED MEMORIES, and the epic telling of the Cane bloodline in BONDED BY ROYALTY, where Damien Cane and his followers find themselves fighting against all odds to fulfill their destiny before they are met face-to-face by their impending fate.
